name: authman
description: AuthMan is a lightweight identity management service that offers user provisioning, login, and SSO features. It is built for self-hosting and includes API endpoints and minimal web UI for administration.
features: Identity Management: Lightweight user provisioning and management. Simple IAM.
SSO Features: Single sign-on for your applications. Unified access.
User Provisioning: Create and manage user accounts centrally. Streamlined administration.
API Endpoints: Programmatic access for integrations. Developer-friendly.
Web Administration: Minimal UI for user management. Clean interface.
Login Service: Centralized authentication for apps. Consistent security.
Self-Hosted: Run your own identity service. Complete control.
Lightweight: Minimal resource requirements. Efficient operation.
